text: When it came to Kylie Jenner's appearance at this year's Met Gala there were many things to talk about. She welcomed her first child just three months ago, it was her first public appearance with baby daddy Travis Scott, and her rather racy choice of a Matrix - inspired outfit to a Catholic - themed fashion event. However, the ultimate fan takeaway from the 20 - year - old's return to the gala was a mysterious mark on her left shoulder, which was visible while posing with Selena Gomez. What happened? A Band - Aid mark on Kylie Jenner's arm was just barely visible as she posed with Selena Gomez at the Met Gala on Monday night and it soon went viral on Twitter The mark, which looked like either a Band - Aid covered over with makeup or the remnants of a bandage, was
